segments.text: I observe the adult woman, diligently focused on her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She is drying a plate with a dish towel, her motions precise.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her attention is entirely fixed on this simple, domestic chore.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a picture of routine, an everyday moment of calm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet, the faucet is running wide open, relentlessly filling the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water has already started to pour over the front edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A substantial puddle is forming, reaching her foot, which is submerged.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her face remains absolutely neutral, betraying no awareness whatsoever.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems completely oblivious to the rising water and the growing mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s hard to fathom how she doesn’t feel the water on her foot.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I also notice the children’s dangerous antics behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are on a precarious stool, stealing cookies, also unnoticed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her absorption is so complete, it's almost unnerving.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This level of unawareness makes me quite concerned for her.
segments.speaker: PAR
